Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="UpdateTDCDataSet" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Label" Type="System.String" Value="UpdateTDC;##datetime##;[SCP_MARKER]"/> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Msmq"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="UpdateTDCDataTable"> <Columns> <Column Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="TERMINAL_DEVICE_CONTRACT_ID" Type="System.Int64"/> <Column Name="PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID" Type="System.Int64"/> <Column Name="MSISDN" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="CLIENT_ID" Type="System.String"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row REQUEST_ID="##ASYNC_REQUEST_ID##" TERMINAL_DEVICE_CONTRACT_ID="##TerminalDeviceID##" PERSONAL_ACCOUNT_ID="##PersonalAccount##" MSISDN="##msisdn##" CLIENT_ID="[SCP_MARKER]"/> </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
